events.name: TST Sober Faction: Sobriety Without Superstition
events.description: Co-director Joe Dee will host a speaker meeting on May 1.

events.name: Struggle For Justice: Scottsdale Analysis & Case Updates from TST's Legal Team
events.description: The latest on our lawsuits: Scottsdale's Invocation lawsuit. Analysis & Case Updates from Lucien Greaves, joined by TST's Legal Team from Matthew Kezhaya (TST Counsel), Stu De Haan (TST Counsel). We are also joined by Monica Miller (American Humanists Association) -- a renowned Constitutional lawyer who provided preparatory support for the Scottsdale case.

events.name: Embracing The Satanic Witch: Using Ritual + Tarot + Mysticism to Illuminate Your Path
events.description: Join Priestess Shiva Honey as she discusses her path as a Satanic Witch, dispels common misconceptions about witchcraft and Satanism, and shows you how you can use ritual, tarot +  card reading, and mysticism to enrich your Satanic practice. This lecture will be followed by a DJ set by Shiva and Grahamzig.

events.name: Struggle For Justice: Belle Plaine Analysis & Case Updates from TST's Legal Team
events.description: The latest on our lawsuits: Belle Plaine's monument. Analysis & Case Updates from Lucien Greaves, joined by TST's Legal Team from Matthew Kezhaya (TST Counsel), Stu De Haan (TST Counsel), Jason Juran (TST Co-Counsel Belle Plaine.) We are also joined by Monica Miller (American Humanists Association) -- a renowned Constitutional lawyer who provided preparatory support for the Scottsdale case.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry!
events.description: Livestreaming your new best friends, bats from BatWorld. Donate at batworld.org

events.name: A Happy Hooven Home: Goats!
events.description: Livestream of goats. Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Grey Faction Satanic Archives
events.description: TSTVHQ's Satanic Archive Library is open all night. Texts courtesy of Center for Inquiry and Grey Faction.
